languages.text: "Я буду нести службу на Веабосе-6, пока сам мир или его обитатели не закончат мое существование. А пока этот день не настал, я буду ковать из этой тюрьмы образец имперского порядка".
"I will serve on Vheabos VI until either the world itself or its inhabitants end my existence. Until that day, I will mould this prison into a paragon of Imperial order."
languages.original_text: "Я буду нести службу на Веабосе-6, пока сам мир или его обитатели не закончат мое существование. А пока этот день не настал, я буду ковать из этой тюрьмы образец имперского порядка".

traits.locale_text: "I will serve on Vheabos VI until either the world itself or its inhabitants end my existence. Until that day, I will mold this prison into a model of Imperial order."
"I will serve on Vheabos VI until either the world itself or its inhabitants end my existence. Until that day, I will mold this prison into a model of Imperial order."
"I will serve on Vheabos VI until either the world itself or its inhabitants end my existence. Until that day, I will mould this prison into a paragon of Imperial order."
"I will serve on Vheabos VI until either the world itself or its inhabitants end my existence. Until that day, I will mould this prison into a paragon of Imperial order."
"I will serve on Vheabos VI until either the world itself or its inhabitants end my existence. Until that day, I will mould this prison into a paragon of Imperial order."
"I will serve on Vheabos VI until either the world itself or its inhabitants end my existence. Until that day, I will mould this prison into a paragon of Imperial order."

languages.text: 「俺はヴィアボス・VIで仕え続ける。この惑星か、住民が俺の存在を終わらせるその日まで。その日が来るまで、この監獄を帝国の秩序の模範に変えていく」
languages.original_text: "I will serve on Vheabos VI until either the world itself or its inhabitants end my existence. Until that day, I will mould this prison into a paragon of Imperial order."

traits.locale_text: 「俺はヴィアボス・VIで仕え続ける。この惑星か、住民が俺の存在を終わらせるその日まで。その日が来るまで、この監獄を帝国の秩序の模範に変えていく」

languages.text: "Ich werde auf Vheabos-VI dienen, bis entweder die Welt selbst oder ihre Bewohner meine Existenz beenden. Bis zu diesem Tag werde ich aus diesem Gefängnis ein Musterbeispiel imperialer Ordnung machen."
languages.original_text: "I will serve on Vheabos VI until either the world itself or its inhabitants end my existence. Until that day, I will mould this prison into a paragon of Imperial order."

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde auf Vheabos-VI dienen, bis entweder die Welt selbst oder ihre Bewohner meine Existenz beenden. Bis zu diesem Tag werde ich aus diesem Gefängnis ein Musterbeispiel imperialer Ordnung machen."

languages.text: « Je resterai sur Vhéabos-VI jusqu'à la disparition de cette planète, ou ma propre disparition aux mains de ses habitants. En attendant ce jour, je m'efforcerai de faire de cette prison un véritable modèle de l'ordre impérial. »
languages.original_text: "I will serve on Vheabos VI until either the world itself or its inhabitants end my existence. Until that day, I will mould this prison into a paragon of Imperial order."

traits.locale_text: « Je resterai sur Vhéabos-VI jusqu'à la disparition de cette planète, ou ma propre disparition aux mains de ses habitants. En attendant ce jour, je m'efforcerai de faire de cette prison un véritable modèle de l'ordre impérial. »

languages.text: «Serviré en Vheabos VI hasta que el propio planeta o sus habitantes pongan fin a mi existencia. Y mientras espero ese día, convertiré esta prisión en un modelo del orden imperial».
languages.original_text: "I will serve on Vheabos VI until either the world itself or its inhabitants end my existence. Until that day, I will mould this prison into a paragon of Imperial order."

traits.locale_text: «Serviré en Vheabos VI hasta que el propio planeta o sus habitantes pongan fin a mi existencia. Y mientras espero ese día, convertiré esta prisión en un modelo del orden imperial».

languages.text: “我会在维博斯六号星服役，直到这个世界或这里的住民夺走我的生命为止。在死亡到来之前，我会不懈努力，将这座监牢改造成帝国秩序的楷模。”
languages.original_text: "I will serve on Vheabos VI until either the world itself or its inhabitants end my existence. Until that day, I will mould this prison into a paragon of Imperial order."

traits.locale_text: “我会在维博斯六号星服役，直到这个世界或这里的住民夺走我的生命为止。在死亡到来之前，我会不懈努力，将这座监牢改造成帝国秩序的楷模。”

languages.text: Dünyanın kendisi ya da onun üzerinde yaşayanlar varlığımı sonlandırana dek Vheabos VI'da hizmet edeceğim. O gün gelene dek de bu zindanı İmparatorluk düzeninin abidesi hâline getireceğim."
languages.original_text: "I will serve on Vheabos VI until either the world itself or its inhabitants end my existence. Until that day, I will mould this prison into a paragon of Imperial order."

traits.locale_text: Dünyanın kendisi ya da onun üzerinde yaşayanlar var oluşumu sonlandırana dek Vheabos VI'da hizmet edeceğim. O gün gelene dek de bu zindanı İmparatorluk düzeninin abidesi hâline getireceğim."
